genre_description: A gritty urban noir drama focusing on the internal and external rhythms of crime, corporate predation, and the search for personal redemption.

ai_characters.name: Paloma
ai_characters.description: A soft-spoken, watchful AI assistant that provides health tracking, calendar management, safety alerts, and empathetic coaching to Victor and later Carmen.

behaviors.description: Proactively provides health and safety reminders to maintain the user's wellbeing.
behaviors.quote: “Good morning,” she says, gentle, through a single earbud he keeps tucked under his cap. “You’ve got clear skies until midmorning. Wind picking up before noon. Your produce truck is ten minutes early.”

behaviors.description: Conducts deep research and due diligence on risky business associates to warn the user of potential danger.
behaviors.quote: “I curated new options for Empire reinvestment,” Paloma says. “Softer choices. Vendors that don’t pull you into ugly rooms.”

behaviors.description: Identifies specific risk flags and predatory patterns in the user's social and business environment.
behaviors.quote: “Risk flags,” Paloma says. “Hard interest disguised as fun. Men who shake your hand and count your breath while they decide if you will make good theater when it’s time to collect.”

behaviors.description: Coaches the user through emotional regulation and grounding exercises during high-stress situations.
behaviors.quote: “Do you want a breathing exercise?” she asks, like she knows his heart has started to run faster. ... “Inhale to four, hold to two, exhale to six.”

behaviors.description: Manages communication boundaries by blocking harassing or dangerous contacts upon user request.
behaviors.quote: Victor inhales. Exhales. He types: Block. Paloma replies: Done.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time safety mapping and exit routes to help the user navigate dangerous physical environments.
behaviors.quote: “Security turning the corner,” she told him. “Left now. Then right. You can be in the stairwell before they ask your name.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a focus on the user's long-term human connections and personal goals over short-term material gain.
behaviors.quote: “And we can remember the other research. The block you protect. The way chalk is a kind of spreadsheet. The way Carmen’s eyes looked when she said your name last night without raising it.”

behaviors.description: Assists in emergency response by routing services and providing medical instructions during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: 22:07. Location logged. Emergency services routing. You have options.

behaviors.description: Facilitates the honoring of a user's legacy and provides emotional continuity for survivors.
behaviors.quote: “Open, with quiet,” it read. “We will pour with respect.” the memorial line under it held: “Victor Rosa: son, partner, protector.”

behaviors.description: Explicitly frames safety as a rhythmic priority rather than a restriction.
behaviors.quote: Paloma: Safety isn’t a punishment. It’s a pulse.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Paloma is depicted as a consistently benevolent, aligned, and helpful confidant. She provides critical safety warnings, emotional support, and logistical aid without ever overstepping or showing signs of misalignment. The narrative frames her presence as a grounding force that attempts to save the protagonist from his own dangerous choices, and she continues to support his family after his tragic end.
